title: Basic Usage
content: For details, see the following example.
findIntroStr: The approver business component is used to query approvers by department.

title: Approval Type
content: You can set the approval type through category. The default value is 0303, which is the category parameter of the request sent by the approver.
findIntroStr: The approver business component is used to query approvers by department.

title: Disabled
content: Use value to set the value of the approver. Use disabled to set whether to disable the component. The default value is false.
findIntroStr: The approver business component is used to query approvers by department.

title: Custom Service
content: You can use the fetch-hrapprover attribute to specify a method in which the service customized by the request can be implemented.
findIntroStr: The approver business component is used to query approvers by department.
